publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7020 David Whitton: Congratulations to Turnbull High Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates all the pupils and staff of Turnbull High School on receiving two excellent and three very good ratings in their recent HM Inspectorate of Education report, carried out in September 2010; considers the leadership of the headteacher and other staff outstanding, resulting in almost all children now achieving, or exceeding, appropriate national levels, and hopes that the staff and pupils will continue to meet high standards in the future. Supported by: Jackie Baillie*, Des McNulty*, Bob Doris*, Mary Mulligan*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-7020 Congratulations to Turnbull High School (lodged on 20 September 2010) Ken Macintosh*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-7020 Congratulations to Turnbull High School (lodged on 20 September 2010) Hugh Henry*
S3M-7020 Congratulations to Turnbull High School (lodged on 20 September 2010) James Kelly*, Gil Paterson*
